channel.title: Lifestyle on Portfolio website for Chushi Guo

item.title: About me
item.description: Having completed my BBA degree at ESADE Business School in Spain with an exchange semester at Cornell University in the US, I decided to undertake a more specialized Master’s degree in finance to deepen my understanding of different financial topics and fully prepare myself for an investment banking career. Therefore, I am currently reading for my Masters in Financial Analysis degree at London Business School in the UK. Prior to LBS, I have completed IB internships in Germany and the UK.
